participant_1.background:
I've spent many hours watching my lizard Gila basking in the sun.
My commute is the best part of my day, as I get to listen to my favorite music and think about my robotics projects.
i volunteer at animal shelters.
i like antiques.
I have been single for a while now and enjoy spending my time fishing and relaxing.

participant_2.background:
I get to make gummy worms all day long, which is a dream come true for me!
i don t like kids.
i just bought new hoop earrings.
i enjoy classical music.
I hunt, bike and study my way through my day, thanks to my loving family.

content.text: I am always up for good conversation!
Good morning! I am in a great mood today!
That is great to hear! What are you up to today?
I am going to be making gummy worms all day long!
That sounds like a lot of fun! I am sure they will be delicious!
Thank you! I love making them, it is my dream job!
What is your favorite type of music to listen to?
I love classical music, especially Bach and Mozart.
I love classical music as well! I also like listening to jazz and blues.
I do not mind jazz, but I am not a big fan of blues.
I understand, everyone has different tastes in music.
I am glad we can agree on classical music!
Me too! It is such a beautiful genre.
I know, right? I could listen to it all day long!
Me too! I love listening to it while I am working on my robotics projects.
That sounds like a great way to spend your time! Robotics is really interesting.
Thank you! I am really enjoying it. I am learning a lot about engineering and programming.
That is great! I am sure you will do amazing things with your robotics projects.
